issue_name: Peopleâ€™s Republic of China (PRC) Ministry of State Security APT40 Tradecraft in Action

1.description: The apache server has to be stopped in order to patch the system. This is done via: service apache2 stop

2.description: Update the whole linux server using the command: sudo apt-get update && apt-get upgrade -y

3.description: Promptly patch all internet exposed devices and services, including web servers, web applications, and remote access gateways.

4.description: Consider implementing a centralized patch management system to automate and expedite the process.

5.description: Segment networks to limit or block lateral movement by denying traffic between computers unless required.

6.description: Limit access to servers, file shares, and other resources.

7.description: Apply MFA to all internet accessible remote access services, including web and cloud-based email, collaboration platforms, VPN connections, and remote desktop services.

8.description: Replace any end-of-life equipment to ensure security.
